item.title: Agentic Concolic Execution
item.description: Zhengxiong Luo, Huan Zhao, Dylan Wolff, Cristian Cadar, Abhik Roychoudhury. Accepted in IEEE Symposium on Security and Privacy (S&P) 2026.

item.title: Enhancing Protocol Fuzzing via Diverse Seed Corpus Generation
item.description: Zhengxiong Luo, Qingpeng Du, Yujue Wang, Abhik Roychoudhury, Yu Jiang. Accepted in IEEE Transactions on Software Engineering (TSE) 2025.

item.title: DynPRE: Protocol Reverse Engineering via Dynamic Inference
item.description: Zhengxiong Luo, Kai Liang, Yanyang Zhao, Feifan Wu, Junze Yu, Heyuan Shi, and Yu Jiang. Accepted in Network and Distributed System Security (NDSS) 2024.
